title: Tech Stock Crash Could Get Worse—But Microsoft, Nvidia And More Are Worth Buying Now, Bank Of America Says - Forbes
content: Tech Stock Crash Could Get Worse—But Microsoft, Nvidia And More Are Worth Buying Now, Bank Of America Says  Forbes
description: A massive selloff that’s pushed the Nasdaq down as much as 17% may get worse for names like Tesla and eBay, but some tech stocks are worth buying, Bank of America told clients Tuesday.
